title: Boris Johnson draws criticism for plans to fly home from Glasgow climate summit
content:
1. Boris Johnson draws criticism for plans to fly home from Glasgow climate summit  The Washington Post
  2. What is COP26?  The White House
  3. Biden appears to fall asleep during climate speech despite claiming it's 'greatest threat' to US security  Fox News
  4. As Biden addresses Glasgow climate summit, it's clear talk is no longer cheap  USA TODAY
  5. No greenwash and no fudges: Cop26’s success depends on leaders telling the truth  The Guardian
